items.sentence: Why don\'t you believe me when I say I\'m busy?
You really should\'ve eaten more for breakfast.
I\'m not Mary\'s boyfriend. I\'m just a friend.
I used to know a girl like that many years ago.
Tom still doesn\'t understand French very well.
Tom certainly had an interesting story to tell.
I\'m pretty sure Tom didn\'t tell me the truth.
I wish I\'d remembered to buy flowers for Mary.
I wouldn\'t be that surprised if that happened.
The only person who could\'ve done this is Tom.
